sqlMap.select: /*sevDAO.passcount*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SEV WHERE ID=#ID# AND PASSWD=#PASSWD#
sqlMap.update: /*sevDAO.updatePasswd*/ UPDATE SEV SET PASSWD = #PASSWD# WHERE ID = #ID#
/*sevDAO.LoginDate*/ UPDATE SEV SET LOGIN_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d-%H:%i:%s') WHERE ID =#ID#
UPDATE SEV SET FAIL_COUNT = FAIL_COUNT+1 WHERE ID = #ID#
UPDATE SEV SET LOCK_YN ='Y' WHERE ID = #ID#
sqlMap.select: /*sevDAO.sevList*/ SELECT INX,NAME ,CASE WHEN LEVEL = '0' THEN '관리자' WHEN LEVEL = '1' THEN '매니저' WHEN LEVEL = '2' THEN '팀장' WHEN LEVEL = '3' THEN '팀원' END LEVEL_NAME ,ID ,PHONE ,PASSWD ,AGE ,STWORK ,AUTH_CODE ,LOCK_YN ,FAIL_COUNT ,LOGIN_DATE FROM SEV ORDER BY INX
/*sevDAO.sevSelect*/ SELECT INX,ID,NAME, LEVEL, PHONE, AGE, STWORK,LOCK_YN ,PASSWD FROM SEV WHERE INX = #INX# ORDER BY NAME
sqlMap.update: /*sevDAO.sevUpdate*/ UPDATE SEV SET NAME = #NAME# ,PASSWD = #PASSWD# ,LEVEL = #LEVEL# ,PHONE = #PHONE# ,AGE = #AGE# ,STWORK = #STWORK# ,LOCK_YN = #LOCK_YN# WHERE INX = #INX#
/*sevDAO.userSettingUpdate*/ UPDATE SEV SET NAME = #NAME# ,PHONE = #PHONE# WHERE ID = #ID#
